channel.title: ios 15 on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in ios 15 on Fresh Swift

item.title: iOS 15: Notable UIKit Additions
item.description: Despite SwiftUI stealing the limelight in recent years, UIKit still has a place in Apple's heart. With iOS 15, UIKit gains a host of new capabilities and APIs, and in this post, Jordan Morgan provides instructions on how to use some of them. Swift code samples included.
